outputs.name: pct_hot
outputs.description: The percent of time that conditions are hotter than acceptable limits.

outputs.name: pct_neutral
outputs.description:
The percent of time that conditions are within acceptable limits
(aka. the percent of time comfortable).

outputs.name: pct_cold
outputs.description: The percent of time that conditions are colder than acceptable limits.

inputs.name: _comf_obj
inputs.description:
A Ladybug ComfortCollection object from any of the comfort
model components.

name: LB Comfort Statistics
description:
Get statitics of thermal comfort from a Ladybug Comfort Object.
-
